OrgName: Insperity Performance & Organizational Management, a Division of Insperity Business Services, L.P.
activities: Insperity Business Services, L.P. offers the PerformSmart performance management and the OrgPlus RealTime organizational planning online software solutions through its Insperity Performance and Organizational Management Division that helps businesses better align employees with company goals and objectives through formal performance review processes and organizational charting. When accessing the PerformSmart or OrgPlus RealTime software, data from the European Union is sent to Insperity Performance and Organizational Management servers which are located in Bryan, Texas. These servers then send data back to the users’ local appraisers. The privacy policy for OrgPlus RealTime software is effective as of 10/11/13 and is located at http://www.insperity.com/products/organizational-planning/realtime/privacy-policy.
contactoff1: Insperity Performance & Organizational Management, a Division of Insperity Business Services, L.P.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President of Strategic Business Development, Insperity Business Services, L.P.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Insperity Performance and Organizational Management Division of Insperity Business Services, L.P. is a member of the TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Certification Seal Program.
